results.name: Quest of D: Gofu no Keisyousya
Baba Is You level editor beta

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7, 10
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core 6300 3.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: requires graphics card. minimum gpu needed: NVidia Geforce 760 TI
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5 7400 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1050 ti, or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Free Access
Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey Official Soundtrack Bundle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Runs on mobile phones, so lower end PCs should be fine.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: There is a known issue with some machines where the default Ren'Py renderer, OpenGL, causes some hitching and stuttering. If you notice even very minor issues, please try: Shift+G, and change "default renderer" to "Force Angle/DirectX Renderer."

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14 (Mojave)
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
